channel.title: NPM on IT生活
channel.description: Recent content in NPM on IT生活

item.title: Xtools帮助文档
item.description: 图片上传 示例 代码 <template> <div> <xui-image-upload baseUrl="https://norisk-dev-1305901002.cos.ap-chengdu.myqcloud.com/" action="http://192.168.1.59:9001/app/company/h5/v1/common/ant/upload" :headers="headers" v-model="images" :maxNum="3" ></xui-image-upload > </div> </template> <script> export default { data () { return { headers: { xxx: 'xxxxxxx' }, images: [ { name: '测试1', original: '20210910/3ec7557b2a0d40a69b58b9f16a7cf2b1.png?imageMogr2/format/tpg', path: '20210910/3ec7557b2a0d40a69b58b9f16a7cf2b1.png' } ] } }, mounted () {}, methods: {} } </script> <style scoped lang="less"></style>

item.title: Afd-Lib组件帮助文档
item.description: 视频预览列表 点击播放 示例 <template> <div> <lz-video url="path" :data-list="videoDataList" /> </div> </template> <script> export default { data () { return { videoDataList: [ { path: 'http://127.0.0.1:8080/1.mp4' }, { path: 'http://127.0.0.1:8080/3.mp4' } ] } }, created () {}, mounted () {}, methods: {} } </script> <style></style> 属性说明 属性 说明 类型 默认值 url dataList 中视
